data.title: Where is Izmir, Turkey on Map Lat Long Coordinates
data.meta_description: Where is Izmir, Turkey on map with latitude and longitude gps coordinates are given in both decimal degrees and DMS format, see where Izmir, Turkey is located on the map.
data.text:
Izmir, Turkey

Latitude and longitude coordinates are: 38.423733, 27.142826.

Izmir, also known as Smyrna, is one of the largest cities in Turkey, located in the Aegean Region, right on the shores of the Aegean Sea, surrounded by numerous islands and amazing green nature. The city is also an educational center with institutions like Ege University, Dokuz Eylül University, İzmir University of Economics, İzmir Institute of Technology, and so on. Adnan Menderes International Airport is the major airport in the city, located in Gaziemir. It also has urban ferry services in the Gulf of İzmir. The city hosts a lot of trade fairs, exhibitions, congresses, and international sports events. Izmir International Fair is the oldest tradeshow in the country.

There is plenty of attractions in Izmir, starting from historic architecture and the remarkable Clock Tower, and ending up with the Kordon promenade and a large modern port. Izmir is famous for its free spirit and an excellent friendly atmosphere admired by all tourists and visitors of the region. Other landmarks and attractions in the city are Gündoğdu Square, Konak Square, Kadifekale Mountain, Hisar Mosque, Basmane Railway Station, Ahmed Adnan Saygun Arts Center, Atatürk Museum, Kültürpark, Izmir Historical Elevator, ancient sites like Ephesus and Pergamum, Agora Ruins, and many more.
